plot: Uncle Mistletoe, a winged denizen of the North Pole who serves as Santa Claus's office manager, and his human friend, Aunt Judy, spins stories, sing songs and promote good deeds and kindness.
plot_en: Uncle Mistletoe, a winged denizen of the North Pole who serves as Santa Claus's office manager, and his human friend, Aunt Judy, spins stories, sing songs and promote good deeds and kindness.
plot_es: Uncle Mistletoe, a winged denizen of the North Pole who serves as Santa Claus's office manager, and his human friend, Aunt Judy, spins stories, sing songs and promote good deeds and kindness.
title: The Adventures of Uncle Mistletoe
